channel.title: Time Travelling Map Makers Wanted
channel.description:
Greetings Earthlings!
Getting tired of making maps that make sense? Miss the old days when ten thousand crates was the norm and everyone loved random architecture? Well, fret no longer!
The [url='https://www.wallworm.net/index.php/topic,1500.0.html']Wall Worm Old School Mapping Contest #1[/url] is here. No models and displacements are even allowed! Oh, and no Hammer either. Seriously.
So pull out your Pearl Jam CDs and go old school today! Bring a little piece of BSP Heaven back from the past.

item.title: Time Travelling Map Makers Wanted
item.dc:creator: wallworm
item.description:
Prizes now announced. Winner gets all commercial Wall Worm plugins and a license of GrowFX.

Read full topic
